name: University of Zilina
about: The University of Zilina's Aviation Training and Educational Centre, established in 1974, is a premier institution for aviation training in Slovakia. Located at the international Airport Zilina – Dolný Hričov, the school offers comprehensive programs for pilots and air transport managers. It provides airplane flight training, aviation college degrees, and certifications, adhering to JAR-FCL and ICAO standards. The centre includes modern facilities, maintenance and repair workshops, hangars, and research laboratories. With a rich history of training over 353 CPL(A) and 156 CPL/IR licenses, the University of Zilina is committed to innovation and excellence, preparing students for successful careers in aviation. Whether you aspire to be a pilot or a leader in air transport management, the University of Zilina has the tools and expertise to support your journey.
